QueryDefinition.Query: select cast(p.patient_sk AS BIGINT) AS person_id, c.encounter_id, prov.physician_id, case when l.loinc_code is null or l.loinc_code = '' then cast(c.event_code_id as varchar) else l.loinc_code end as source_value, case when l.loinc_code is null or l.loinc_code = '' then 0 else 1 end as isloinc, case when c.event_start_dt_tm is null then c.event_end_dt_tm else c.event_start_dt_tm end as start_date, c.normal_high, c.normal_low, l.lab_procedure_name, ec.event_code_desc, u.unit_display, c.result_value_num FROM {sc}.hf_f_clinical_event as c JOIN {sc}.hf_f_encounter as e on e.encounter_id = c.encounter_id JOIN {sc}.hf_d_patient as p on e.patient_id = p.patient_id JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND p.patient_sk = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE LEFT JOIN {sc}.hf_d_lab_procedure as l on l.lab_procedure_id = c.lab_procedure_id LEFT JOIN {sc}.hf_d_event_code as ec on c.event_code_id = ec.event_code_id LEFT JOIN {sc}.hf_d_unit as u on u.unit_id = c.result_units_id LEFT JOIN {sc}.hf_d_physician as prov on performed_prsnl_id = prov.physician_id order by p.patient_sk
